summary: Completed E2E testing of Iteration 50 features: WhatsApp handoff with window.open() and audit logging, Admin Intake Schema Manager with draft/publish workflow, Admin Canned Responses CRUD with soft delete, and Knowledge Base/FAQ system. All 27 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - Chat widget with FAQ/Chat tabs, 6 Quick Actions, WhatsApp handoff button, Public KB page with 9 categories, Admin KB page, and Admin Canned Responses page all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed articles and canned responses during testing (cleaned up via soft delete)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 50 verified all new features: 1) WhatsApp handoff uses window.open() instead of iframe - POST /api/support/audit/whatsapp-handoff logs SUPPORT_WHATSAPP_HANDOFF_CLICKED event, 2) Admin Intake Schema Manager - GET /api/admin/intake-schema/services returns list of services, GET/PUT /{service_code} for editing/saving drafts, POST /{service_code}/publish for publishing, 3) Admin Canned Responses - full CRUD at /api/admin/support/responses with soft delete (is_active=false) and reactivate endpoint, 4) Knowledge Base - GET /api/kb/categories returns 9 default categories, GET /api/kb/featured returns popular/recent articles, Admin endpoints for article CRUD and analytics, 5) Chat widget has FAQ tab (default) with search and top questions, Chat tab with 6 Quick Actions (Check Order Status, Reset Password, Document Packs, Billing Help, CVP Info, Speak to Human), 6) Public KB page at /support/knowledge-base shows all 9 categories with article counts.

whatsapp_handoff.window_open: PASS - Uses window.open() instead of iframe

admin_intake_schema_manager.GET_services: PASS - Returns list of configurable services
admin_intake_schema_manager.GET_schema: PASS - Returns schema for editing with draft support

admin_canned_responses.POST_create: PASS - Creates new response with audit

knowledge_base_public.GET_featured: PASS - Returns popular and recent articles

knowledge_base_admin.GET_list_articles: PASS - Returns all articles including drafts

chat_widget.faq_tab: PASS - Shows search and top questions
chat_widget.quick_actions: PASS - Check Order Status, Reset Password, Document Packs, Billing Help, CVP Info, Speak to Human
chat_widget.handoff_options: PASS - Live Chat, Email Ticket, WhatsApp
chat_widget.whatsapp_button: PASS - Continue on WhatsApp button visible

integrations_status.knowledge_base: WORKING - 9 categories seeded, public and admin APIs functional
integrations_status.canned_responses: WORKING - CRUD with soft delete and audit logging
